body:
We should be able to simply register wait as a builtin with schema:
```
"aten::wait(Future[t] self) -> t"
```
This way we do not need tons of ugly SugaredValue handling for it.

"aten::wait(Future[t] self) -> t"

This way we do not need tons of ugly SugaredValue handling for it.
